channel.title: [Release] Runescape Chat Spammer
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]Runescape Chat Spammer[/size]
[img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2z8afqe.png[/img]
Hello, i have created today a spammer for runescape. Right now, it only works for the actual "RuneScape" application, and web browser game. I will latter update it, so you can use it with any other tools or bots. Also great for advertising your forums on Runescape or your private server.
This is easy to use, just run your game, and run the spammer. Type in your message, and how many seconds you want the message to be sent. You can pause this by clicking the "Pause" button on your keyboard generally it's after the "f12" button.
I coded this using autoit. so a couple of AV pick up the fact i made this in autoit instead of C. for those that dont know, autoit is basically it's own language based on basic. and has functions of any other languages.
I assure you that there are no viruses with this program, the AV scan picks up that i used autoit, and a packer.
Scans: RS Spammer.exe - Jotti's malware scan https://www.virustotal.com/file/1440...is/1343677902/
[b]Credits:[/b] ty13rh27 - Not made by me!
Download:
http://uppit.com/xxkvkbdy8b5j/RS_Spammer.rar [/center]
